channel.title: Bleh, server status problem
channel.description: Bleh, i have this weird error with the server status page.before you say anything, i searched multipull sites, and googled it, AND my server is running.i have the right ip, i have tryed multipull ips includeing my own, and many other no-ips that i have made.when i try to register my server it says 'You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'rebelscape.sytes.net' OR `ipfield` = '65.184.87.25'' at line 1'.this is very annoying and my server isnt fun without people on it lol. help is very much appreciated.thatnks in advance.*EDIT*tryed a new search, found topics like my own, but it says topic is eather missing or is off limits, every single one of them.bleh, this is getting annoying xD.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 03:35:04 PM[/size][hr]gah, reply xD

item.title: Bleh, server status problem
item.dc:creator: @rebelfly rebelfly
item.description:
@rebelfly wrote:

Bleh, i have this weird error with the server status page.before you say anything, i searched multipull sites, and googled it, AND my server is running.i have the right ip, i have tryed multipull ips includeing my own, and many other no-ips that i have made.when i try to register my server it says ‘You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ’ IP= 'rebelscape.sytes.net' ORipfield` = ‘65.184.87.25’’ at line 1’.this is very annoying and my server isnt fun without people on it lol. help is very much appreciated.thatnks in advance.EDITtryed a new search, found topics like my own, but it says topic is eather missing or is off limits, every single one of them.bleh, this is getting annoying xD.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 03:35:04 PM[/size][hr]gah, reply xD

Read full topic
